E-commerce

A new e-commerce website for a leading brand of professional beauty tools

Navy Professional needed a new website platform to enable their booming business to operate at scale.

The existing design was outdated and didn’t reflect the brand that their loyal fanbase had grown to love.

Product Design

0 to 1 design of a highly-configurable and scalable Case Management System

The Home Office needed a new case management platform that would provide reusable design patterns and could be easily scaled across multiple business areas to replace existing grey IT solutions.

E-commerce

B2B e-commerce site for a leading manufacturer of healthcare products

A series of acquisitions had left Drive Devilbiss Healthcare's previous site as a mashup of multiple, disconnected brands. They needed a new site with a considered information architecture to bring their offering under one new, improved proposition.

B2B

New website following a rebrand of UK’s leading structural steel experts

Severfield needed a new website that would effectively communicate their proposition and align to their new company strategy.
